name: 2025 the 2nd International Conference on Structural Engineering and Construction Technology
content: Publication: All papers will be sent to 2-3 peer-reviewers for reviewing. After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published into SECT 2025 conference proceedings by AIP, and submitted for indexing by Scopus (Elsevier), CPCI (part of Web of Science), Inspec, CAS, etc.
